```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
penguins <-  read_csv('data/penguins.csv')
penguins
```
```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_depth_mm, y = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm')
```
